vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.2.61; also called Hobaiah at Neh.7.63;
§ Habaiah = "Jehovah has hidden"
head of a priestly family who returned from exile with Zerubbabel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: jefe de familia; sacerdotes; post exílico
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈巴雅 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華已隱藏"
跟隨所羅巴伯被擄歸回的一個祭司家族領袖
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
哈巴雅 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华已隐藏"
跟随所罗巴伯被掳归回的一个祭司家族领袖
